greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. A(x) defined by: A(x)^10 consists entirely of integer coefficients between 1 and 10 (A083950); A(x) is the unique power series solution with A(0)=1.
mathematica: Do[r = Flatten @ Append[r, Reduce[1 <= coes[[k]] <= 10, a[k - 1], Integers] // ToRules];
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, May 20 2003
